title: Tourism Industry Data Analysis: AI-Driven Predictive Modeling Course

context.prior_knowledge: Excel fundamentals, basic data visualization concepts, and foundational knowledge of the tourism industry
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course aimed at workplace application for current practitioners, featuring small-group discussions and personalized feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can collect, refine, and visualize tourism data to analyze key trend patterns.

Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in monthly tourist demand forecasting for destinations using Python-based AI analysis models (e.g., ARIMA, LSTM), propose at least three resource allocation plans (staff/facilities) based on predictions, and write a report meeting at least four of five institutional evaluation checklist items.

Learners analyze over ten datasets of tourist visitor data using Python-based big data tools (Pandas, Tableau, etc.), then write a 5+-page tourism marketing strategy report reflecting data insights. The report must score at least 4/5 points across five institutional evaluation criteria (goal setting, data utilization, creativity, etc.).
Learners understand data privacy protection techniques and apply them to the analysis process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
